final_result:
bubblesort([], Acc, Acc).
bubblesort(List, Acc, Sorted) :-
    bubble_pass(List, NewList, Flag),
    (Flag == 1 ->
        bubblesort(NewList, Acc, Sorted)
    ;
        append(Acc, NewList, Sorted)
    ).
bubble_pass([X,Y|T], [Y|NewT], 1) :-
    X > Y,
    bubble_pass([X|T], NewT, _).
bubble_pass([X,Y|T], [X|NewT], Flag) :-
    X =< Y,
    bubble_pass([Y|T], NewT, Flag).
bubble_pass([X], [X], 0).
bubble_pass([], [], 0).
forth_sort(L, L2) :- bubblesort(L, [], L2).
query(forth_sort([3,1,2,5,7,12], X)).
final_report: The generated code attempts to implement a bubble sort algorithm but contains syntax errors and logical issues. The main problem is the incorrect use of the '->' operator and the undefined predicate 'bubble_pass/3'. The original code correctly implements bubble sort using a 'hole' predicate to handle swaps, while the generated code fails to compile due to these errors. The generated code does not meet the requirements and produces an error instead of a sorted list.
